turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need some pizzas that I can pick up for dinner.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. How many pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I better get three.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like those pizzas to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think we had better go with large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of crust are you wanting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A rising crust please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of these is going to be an extra cheese with sweet tomato sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like on the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: This one is going to start with a parmesan sauce, and let's add extra cheese, pineapple, black olives, and ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. What would you like for the third pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Another one with parmesan sauce, and for toppings let's go with extra cheese, pineapple, black olives, and spinach.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any drinks with those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add a 2 liter of root beer.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any sides or desserts?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, let's do a cookie pizza dessert.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have one large extra cheese pizza with sweet tomato sauce, a large extra cheese, ham, pineapple, black olives pizza with parmesan sauce, and one large pizza with extra cheese, pineapple, black olives, spinach, with parmesan sauce, a cookie pizza, and a 2 liter of root beer. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That sounded right. When will that be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That will be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am texting your receipt to you now. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. We are all good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good evening, and enjoy your pizza!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will. Thank you. Good-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good-bye.
